description: TRESemmé CONDITIONER RESTORE & SHINE 350 MLYou are inspired by nature's beauty. You care for your hair. You want hair that is soft and smooth. Be inspired, be beautiful.Botanique Restore & Shine Shampoo and Conditioner system, with our botanical blend of COCONUT WATER, COCONUT MILK and ALOE VERA gently cleanses hair and nourish it. The specifically crafted formulas include our rich Botanical blend of coconut milk, coconut water and aloe vera. This system gently cleanses and restores smoothness and strength, leaving your hair with brilliant natural-looking shine. No Parabens. No Dyes. Silicone Free. Safe for colour treated hair.HAIR CRAVING MORE?Follow with your favourite TRESemmé styling product OUR PHILOSOPHYFrom our origins in Salons in 1948, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salonTRESemmé is dedicated to creating haircare products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylist and salons, the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day.TRESemmé. Professional. At your fingertips.Goes Well With: TRESemmé. Shampoo Restore and Shine ?TRESemmé Botanique Restore & Shine Conditioner is a salon-quality formula with a blend natural ingredientsNow also contains coconut waterFeatures a botanical blend of coconut milk and aloe veraGently cleanses while smoothing and nourishing hairLeaves hair feeling moisturized and beautifully soft0% Dye, 0% Silicone
name: Tresemme Botanique Restore & Shine Conditioner 350mL
